description:
Seven Knights - Time Wanderer -  Splendid Union Outfit Set
 Fancy in battles - Feel the charm of characters with both strength and appearance.
 
 <Set Contents>
 - Vanessa's Costume "Order of the Hawk"
 - Shane's Costume "Follower of Destruction"
 - Ace's Costume "Destroyer of the Abyss"
 - Lina's Costume "Follower of Destruction"
 - Teo's Costume "Destroyer of the Abyss"
 - Rudy's Costume "Order of the Hawk"
 - Kris's Costume "Order of the Hawk"
 - Karma's Costume "Destroyer of the Abyss"
 - Rin's Costume "Destroyer of the Abyss"
 9 Total
 
 <Warning>
 - You can only purchase the costume once.
 - You can equip in the game after purchasing the costume.
 - Please claim from "May" in the Room of Sand.
 - Hero portraits don't change.
 - Costumes only change hero appearance - they don't increase stats.
name: Splendid Union Costume Set (9 Total)
